title: Is metroid 2 return of samus any good?
body:
I'm wondering if I should buy the stuffs I want on the eShop now or wait for "better games" to pop up (On the MyNintendo reward thingy). 
I've never played any metroid game except a little bit of the FPS one on the wii, so I can't really compare it to any other.
I'm fully aware that the  answer is more subjective than anything and that I should Watch playthroughs on youtube, but.. Eh, I don't know. Watching someone "speedrun" through it won't tell me if it's enjoyable.

Also, MyNintendo question : How does the gold coins works? Is it if you purchase X$ Worth of stuffs you get the associated amount or do you also get everything before? (Like if you buy 60$ of stuffs do you get 50 gold coins or 150) ?
